Html:
Patch 3.1.0 stated that the Disc priest talent change to "Grace: This talent no longer decreases damage done to the target, but the duration has increased to 15 seconds and the healing bonus has increased from 2% to 3%. This affect now cannot be applied to more than one target at a time." It's still on the Buffs tab in Rawr though. This was probably overlooked since it's so minor.

Thanks for working on Rawr! I love it.
